channel.title: S2 on Barrington Brook: Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in S2 on Barrington Brook: Portfolio

item.title: Hashicorp support request
item.description: Introduction Date: 21 Mar 23 Our team provides support to a number of developer teams and every week we select one person to be the main port of call to deal with support requests. On one of my fortnights on support duty, I received a support request that required me to make a support request to Hashicorp, an external organisation that supports a number of our infrastructure tools. The request was do to a developer experiencing unexpected behaviour while using hashicorp nomad.
